summary: This bill, the Caribbean Basin Security Initiative Authorization Act, aims to authorize and enhance U.S. security cooperation with Caribbean nations. It focuses on countering transnational crime, promoting rule of law, and improving natural disaster resilience. It authorizes funding for initiatives including maritime security, law enforcement capacity building, crime prevention, combating corruption, and countering malign influence from authoritarian regimes. It mandates implementation plans and progress updates, and sets up programs and a strategy for disaster response and resilience.
